page.title: 17CHURCHES IN CALVER & CURBAR
page.content:
All Saints Church in Curbar also serves Calver and Froggatt, and has 92 members. 12 children attend Sunday School and the Youth Club meets every week. The Choir and Mothers' Union meet regularly. There is a link with a mission hospital in Zimbabwe.
Calver Methodist Chapel,with 31 members, holds Sunday morning services and activities include the Ladies' Fellowship, Thursday Fellowship, prayer meetings, coffee mornings, Sunday Youth Club, and Mother and Toddler sessions. There is an annual united service with the Anglican Church. The Chapel has supported the Ethiopian Famine Appeal. The Methodist College which trains students for the Methodist Ministry, is closely associated with the local Circuit of Methodist Churches.
